songs.title: Chug (Beats 1 Exclusive)

Woah woah woah woah woah
Woah woah woah woah woah woah woah
Woah woah woah woah woah

Woah woah woah

You got me on a wave
And I can't explain this feeling
Think about you everyday
And I think it’s for a reason

You got me on a wave
And I can't explain this feeling
Think about you everyday
And I think it's for a reason

You know I’m crazy for every bit of you
Please don't tease me with a little drip
Don't want a sip of you
Oh

Please don't tease me with a little drip
Don't want a sip of you (we out)
Oh

Give me a whole glass
Give me a whole glass
I wanna chug chug (yeah)
Give me a whole glass
Give me a whole glass

Give me a whole glass [?]
I want to chug it all
Chug it all
Give me a whole glass
I want to chug it all chug it chug
